Name: hexurb
About the game: hexurb is a calm, peaceful city builder where you can relax after a hard day and just have a good time! You have to place blocks wisely on the playing field, complete tasks, expand the available territory and see how far you can go in your endeavors! hexurb is ready to offer you: calm gameplay pleasant visual style peaceful soundtrack high replayability Actually, there is no team. Just one simple person who loves games and wants to be part of the gaming community.
Meta Title: hexurb: May 31, 2021, Mikhail Neznamov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on hexurb? Check out the release date (May 31, 2021), developer insights from Mikhail Neznamov, and a complete game summary.
